properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_ID , USER_PWD , PHONE
, EMAIL , ADDRESS , INTEREST ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , null , '서울' , ? )
